text: Masih con trai cua Maryam khong la gi ngoai than phan Thien Su nhu bao vi Thien Su truoc Y va me cua Y cung chi la mot phu nu co niem tin kien đinh (vao Allah), ca hai đeu an thuc an (nhu bao nguoi pham khac). Nguoi (hoi Thien Su) hay nhin xem TA trinh bay cho bon ho cac loi mac khai (cua TA) nhu the nao, roi Nguoi hay nhin xem bon ho tranh xa (chan ly) ra sao
